text: The total enrollment of the camp of Dan is one hundred and fifty-seven thousand six hundred. They shall be the last on the march, by divisions.

Yes, the days are coming when I will break your strength and the strength of your father’s house, so that no one in your family lives to old age.

You people of this generation, consider the word of the Lord: Have I become a wilderness to Israel, a land of gloom? Why then do my people say, “We have moved on, we will not come to you any more”?
they shall know that I, the LORD, am their God. I will give them a heart and ears that listen;
